title: More Winners : His master's ghost (Captioned)
creator_contributor_role: Australian Children's Television Foundation, production company
viewing_guidelines: CAPTIONED: suitable for hearing impaired viewers
description: Episode of Series 'More Winners'. A group of children are brought together to holiday at a music camp. set at an old estate, rumoured to have its own live-in ghost. One of the children, Flea, becomes obsessed with tracking down the phantom. Meanwhile Jason is attempting to get his Concerto for Rock Group and Orchestra approved of. During all this, strange things begin to happen whenever the estate's mysterious care-taker is around.
